note: SHT i 184 is identified as not being a parallel to DN 16 in SHT viii p. 172. | SHT iv 412.62 is identified in SHT viii p. 174.

languages.slug: The Buddha discusses the various views of the different sects at that time at the request of a Brahmin.
Portugese translation of The Buddha discusses the various views of the different sects at that time at the request of a Brahmin.
